p: Co-authorship network analyses showed that the USA was the most frequent collaborator of LAC countries (Fig. 3), co-authoring 19% ( n = 210) of all LAC publications. Other frequent collaborating countries were the United Kingdom, Germany, and France, ( n = 71, n = 34, and n = 30, respectively). Collaboration between LAC countries was not as frequent as expected. Brazilian researchers co-authored 17 publications with Colombian and 14 papers with Mexican authors.
